coreAttributes.authorTag: On the underside of the barrel housing, a small engraving reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: pepperball pistol
coreAttributes.description: A miniaturized version of the Pepperball Rifle with a weaker air spell enchantment, this weapon uses the same pepper oil ammunition but has less range and does less damage. Enforcers favor it as a hold-out or secondary weapon.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unholster)] the pistol, [npc.verb(slap)] in a fresh magazine, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety off.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the magazine, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety on, and [npc.verb(holster)] the pistol.
